As part of planning the 4G initiative to be launched on Broadband Wireless Access (BWA) Spectrum in all 22 circles of India, RIL considers the broadband opportunity as a new frontier of knowledge economy in which it can take a leadership position and provide world-class 4G network and services. Reliance Jio Infocomm Limited, a communication based subsidiary of Reliance Industries Limited (RIL), plans to roll out 4G broadband services in India. Moving from Tier 1 cities (Mumbai and Delhi) to lower tiered ones, LTE, WiFi, and FTTx technology will be launched across India. The Program named R4G, focus to provide digital services on LTE and not on just providing bandwidth.

The Reliance Group, founded by Dhirubhai H. Ambani (1932-2002), is Indias largest private sector enterprise, with businesses in the energy and materials value chain. Groups annual revenues are in excess of US$ 66 billion. The flagship company, Reliance Industries Limited, is a Fortune Global 500 company and is the largest private sector company in India.

The Reliance Group, founded by Dhirubhai H. Ambani (1932-2002), is Indias largest private sector enterprise, with businesses in the energy and materials value chain. Groups annual revenues are in excess of US$ 66 billion. The flagship company, Reliance Industries Limited, is a Fortune Global 500 company and is the largest private sector company in India.

Search by title or reference no.
Search by title or ticket no.
Enter Alias name to register payee

Description : 
 Jio MiFi is your very own pocket sized personal, mobile Wi-Fi hotspot router with the power to connect up to 5/ 10 Wi-Fi gadgets at the same time. With the feature of password protected connection it gives you the choice to share your secured high speed connection with close friends and family with peace of mind. 
 Key Features : 

1 . Super-fast Speed across Multiple devices and users 
 2 . Access to high quality and diverse Content 
 3 . Device Design 
 4 . Convenient on-boarding and set-up 
 5 . Easy account management using a single Jio Id across channels- Mobile App and Web

Description : 
 Enjoy high speed internet on the go. Connect to Jio WiFi across public locations at Jio Hotspots in your city. Experience Ultra High Speed with an unmatched ecosystem of Jio services. 
 Key Features : 

1 . Access Jionet Anywhere 
 2 . High-speed internet access on your WiFi enabled devices 
 3 . Registration on Jio WiFi 
 4 . Superior web experience

Description : 
 Crackling voice calls, low signals, slow speeds are now history. Say hello to 4G LTE. A technology that helps you work smarter and play harder, bringing a plethora of communication possibilities at your fingertips. You will be able to enjoy natural-sounding High-Definition (HD) Voice and a Video Calling experience thats as simple as making a traditional voice call.
With your 4G VoLTE phone, you are now powered to experience a next-gen network and live better. Packed with high-end services and apps enabled by Jio, you will now be able to reimagine life and make every connectivity dream come true. Get unlimited Jio to Jio Voice and Video calling with VoLTE Base Offer. Also, you get free access to 50 sports channel on Jio Play as part of this offer.
Get started. Upgrade to a new way of life! 

Key Features: 

1 . Superior calling experience with HD Voice and Video calls 
 2 . Faster call connection time 
 3 . Switching between Voice and Video calls 
 4 . Free acces to 50 Jio Play Sports channels as part of the offer 
 5 . Real time balance and account information 
 6 . Enhanced communication 
 7 . Easy account management using a single Jio Id across channels- Mobile App and Web 
 8 . Convenient on-boarding and set-up

Description : 
 Jio Fiber Ultra Fast Broadband - High Speed Internet delivered over Fiber to your home. 
 Key Features : 

1 . Download Speeds up to 100 Mbps 
 2 . Future ready - Supports High speed, latency sensitive applications 
 3 . High speed performance powered by a fiber broadband connection

Promotional calls and messages to your Jio ID\'s and registered number should stop within 7 days from registration. You will receive a Unique Reference Number through SMS, for your records. If you have registered and recently updated your preferences, please give us 7 days to implement the changes.
